emails.subject: Re: Jack meet Jana, Mihri (Beams
emails.snippet: Yes, 4/9 at 2pm works well for us. Feel free to send a calendar invite. We are looking forward to it! Best, Mihri and Jana On Wed, Apr 3, 2024 at
emails.body:
Yes, 4/9 at 2pm works well for us. Feel free to send a calendar invite.

We are looking forward to it! Best,
Mihri and Jana

On

emails.subject: Re: Excited to meet soon!
emails.snippet: Hi Angel, We'd love to meet you again and discuss our solution in more detail. Maybe some time next week? Let us know what works best for you. All the best, Mihri and Jana On Tue, Mar 19, 2024 at
emails.body:
Hi Angel,

We'd love to meet you again and discuss our solution in more detail. Maybe
some time next week? Let us know what works best for you.

All the best,
Mihri and Jana

On Tue, Mar 19, 2024 at 6:04 PM Jana Schellong <jana@usebeams.com> wrote:

> Hi Angel,
>
> It was so nice meeting you today. Thanks for a great conversation.
>

>.
>

>

>
> All the best,
> Mihri and Jana
